Name: The Old Church
Review Text: The Old Church was an affordable option and a gorgeous setting. Perfect for those who want a "church" wedding, but are not of a church or mixed beliefs. The setting is beautiful and full of light for pictures.  Working with the staff was …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Nice little venue! It goes without saying that churches have some of the best acoustics given their shape, but the renovations here were done exceptionally well for the audio.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Michael Allen Harrison Christmas concert was amazing. Covid restrictions in place yet comfortable venue with a fairly quick entry. The sound was awesome all afternoon. So glad to have seen the lovely inside of the Old Church.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Lovely charming building with good acoustics. A great venue. Friendly staff. Vac and masks required. Not much room for social distancing.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: A friend and I met up here for a one wo(man) show to see Miss Coco Peru.  The venue was amazing and historic well-kept etc etc.  It made me wonder why I never continued my architecture studies having loved that factor of the venue as well.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: We had a wonderful evening exerperiencing The Moth live for the first time. TOC is a great venue to The Moth. Covid-19 protections were excellent.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful church building! So excited to go to a concert here! Found parking easily.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Love the Old Church Concert Hall for weddings. I have photographed a couple of weddings here already and it never fails to produce beautiful photos. One of the weddings was styled as a vintage style wedding and the other wedding was a …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: This is a perfect place for an intimate concert. The acoustics are amazing and the ambiance is beautiful. Not a bad seat in the house and lots of paid parking nearby.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: What a special venue. The acoustics, as one can imagine, are simply fantastic. Such a beautiful atmosphere to listen to music in. Because the audience seating is the actual church pews centered around the dais, it lends intimacy and almost a sacral feeling to the performances.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautifully restored and converted to an intimate music venue. Would happily come back.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Super cool venue! Plenty of room, great acoustics, and a classy vibe all around. If you're a band looking to take your gigs to the next level, this may be a perfect place to add prestige.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Awesome concert venue. If the paint job (colors) were better (it is painted to look cheap), the visuals (architecture) would add even more.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Karla Bonoff was fantastic! Venue was intimate and acoustics good. Pews were not super comfortable, but were padded.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: An amazing, small, intimate venue!! The acoustics complemented the musician harmoniously. We sat just a couple of rows from the stage, but it really felt like we were right on stage. A historic site held relevant for generations to come. Thank you Van Hunt for bringing us to the Old Church Concert Hall!!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: What a COOL venue! So pretty, very unique. Super strict with COVID protocol. Drink option was WEAK. Drinks cut off early.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Portland's 1883 Old Church (please, my Norsk cousins, don't laugh at that year) is a "must-see" happening every holiday season. Loving his new "Winter" CD music. Bought his newest CD for our celebration this year.The space has beautiful …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Great concert venue, small enough for a more intimate concert, yet still holds a significant number of people!  Availability of beer and wine a nice bonus.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Unique venue with amazing acoustics. Great location for acoustic or lower key music. Church pughs are still in place, which are actually comfortable but not so conducive to bands you'd want to stand for.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful old church that's now used for concerts, weddings and gatherings. Maybe not the best sound for the true audiophile but it looks amazing inside! Go check it out!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: If you didn't arrive in the Christmas spirit you will definitely leave in a special Christmas spirit awesome music terrific concert Merry Christmas 🎄

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful historic building repurposed as a performance venue. An awesome experience!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Great space for events. There is room for improvement as far as accessibility is concerned but otherwise good event space

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Perfect stage for The Moth! Parking outside is clutch for downtown too.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful old church with nice acoustics. Has pew seating so bring a pillow if you need one. Perfect venue for catching Jean-Michel Blais on piano.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful place, and great sound. Such an excellent place for the #pdxbookfest, with beautiful touches all over.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Amazing theatre experience in a beautiful old church rich with Portland history and an epic organ too!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text:
Literally an Old Church, this could be my favorite new venue.

Small and intimate, with good acoustics, maybe a dozen pews, with padded seats. Bar next door, restrooms downstairs, it's got all you need.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful concert! Lovely and wonderful artists!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: This place is amazing inside & out! We watched a magic show there done by Mario the Maker Magician

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: This is a beautiful venue. Don't take my word for it - do a Google image search. I was searching for the next venues for Tuck & Patti - who will be there Feb 25. They are awesome - I just saw them in Santa Cruz on Valentine's Day and want …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: The staff was very kind and accommodating and the venue is beautiful.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful concert venue with an intimate feel. Acoustics are very good. Center pews have great sight lines to the stage. Beer, wine, soft drinks and snacks served in entrance hall. Operated with heart and a sense of mission. Memorable!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Great intimate venue. Awesome acoustics!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful old church. Great acoustics.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Awesome...Michael Allen Harrison and crew did a great job.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: a beautiful location for particularly salt of the earth, folksy music, the old church has stunning acoustics and a very intimate setting. seating just under 300 people, semi-popular acts coming through the old church sell out almost …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: We had our wedding ceremony here at the end of July, and it was perfect! Gina was amazing to work with and went out of her way to let us stop by (multiple times) to check out the space. The ceremony itself went perfect, and our dog was …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Admittedly I am biased toward this venue as my grandmother was crucial to its restoration.  That said, it's a lovely space to see a concert, and I'm sure the same can be said for a church service.  Great acoustics and an intimate performance space.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful acoustics, ADA friendly, easy parking

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Our second time attending a wedding here. It's nice for a ceremony. I like the stage. Its made for a smaller production which is fine but they absolutely need some way to amplify the voices of the people speaking. Both weddings I attended I had to make up words they might be saying. It is so difficult to hear anything.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Quite possibly one of the best concert venues I've ever attended.  As the name suggests, this is, in fact, and old church.  It is a very ornate, opulent church.  There is a HUGE pipe organ from 1882, and at the concert we attended, there …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Great acoustics at this venue and space.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Saw the posies there and it's a really lovely space. If you're handicapped, there's an elevator, but it was locked and I decided I'd rather chance the stairs than miss more of the show. Sight lines are great and you can buy a drink.  The steinway also was in tune and gorgeous.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: The space has beautiful interior (and exterior) architecture that really creates an atmosphere. For it truly being a building designed to be a church, when I attend events here I don’t get an overwhelming sense of religion from the space. …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: A great use for a former church. It would have gotten five stars but the seating is the original pews.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Good concert venue. Very nice acoustics, a beautiful organ as a backdrop, pretty good sightlines from almost all seats, and they've finally put in small plaques giving seat numbers so assigned seating is now the norm (almost always used to be open seating).

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Went to see and hear Tuvan throat singers in the Old Church Concert Hall tonight. Fabulous. Great acoustics. Lovely venue. You can purchase  beer, wine, hard cider, herbal teas, & yummy cookies there.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: This is a great room to see shows. I've been about 4-5 times now. Occasionally I've had challenges hearing lead vocals or jokes that performers are telling when they are talking, but I imagine that has more to do with the speaker array …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Went to the Wendy Gledhill "Rabbithole" concert here. The atmosphere was perfect!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Michael Allen Harrison and friends in concert resonated throughout the Old Church!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: I came here to see Colin Meloy perform. The acoustics were absolutely superb. The entire performance felt so intimate and surreal. The way the Church is laid out, it makes you feel like you and the artist are side-by-side and there's …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text:
Recently I was able to see one of my favorite artists at this venue.

Only a few people can say that they truly have natural talent. Liz longley is …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Great spot for a small crowd show.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Show was wonderful, convenient parking! But mostly I have to complement the staff on there gracious handling me me in my scooter.  Took me down to the handicapped bathroom in the little elevation.  Could not have been kinder!  Thank you so much!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: I never knew that this church was not a functional church but instead a music venue. The sound guy did a great job with both groups we saw (Tomo  Nakayama, and Lenore.).  The pews all had cushions so it was still fairly comfortable, and the …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Whether you are listening to music having a drink or just walking around this is an amazing place to visit. Sometimes the best time to go is when there's nothing going on and just walking around. But it's the acoustics are amazing.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: What a beautiful church!!  We were lucky enough to take in the Christmas  At the Old Church Concert with Michael Allen Harrison.  Incredible music to a STO audience.  A definite stop if you're here on the Christmas Holiday!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Wonderful venue with an impressive organ and beautiful stained glass windows that hosts really cool music-especially great for folk/ world folk fans. Great acoustics to boot.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: I find this a very pleasant venue to attend a concert or performance. It's small enough to feel intimate but not cramped. I've been to three different shows, sitting in different spots and enjoyed each one - it'd be hard to get a bad seat …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Wow, just went here for the first time last night. What a cool venue! The older I get the more places like this are my speed. Calm, relaxed, lots of places to sit, and the acoustics are just fantastic.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: The Old Church Concert Hall is one of the more beautiful venues to see a show.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: I experienced the most memorable concert of my life in this building. The acoustics and intimacy of this venue made for a life changing experience. I can't wait to go back.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Great entertainment venue. Good view of the stage and good acoustics. Well managed people movement. Most enjoyable evening.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: The Old Church orginally known as The Calvary Presbyterian Church was built in 1882 and added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1972.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: A Michael Allen Harrison Christmas concert at Downtown Portland's 1883 Old Church (please, my Norsk cousins, don't laugh at that year) is a "must-see" happening every holiday season. Loving his new "Winter" CD music. Bought his newest CD for our celebration  this year. Thank you, Dan.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: This building is a jewel. The pipe organ is wonderful and the old building has history from early days of th city. I have been to weddings, concerts and heard speakers over the course of the last 50 years. I am so pleased that is has ben preserved and is still used.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Attended the annual Michael Allen Harrison, Christmas at The Old Church music program, celebrating its 25th year. They had 25 performances this year. This will be a yearly event for my family. I highly recommend!!! The church is so beautiful, too!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: A really pretty building. It can get a bit hot in the spring or summer since they don't have much when it comes to air conditioning. The bathrooms are a little out of the way also. Other than that, it's an amazing place!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful church with an interesting history.  The pianist & organist superb.  What a wonderful noon program for so many people.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful venue, great acoustics. The padding on the pews is the only issue for some, so bring a seat cushion if you need it.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Recently rebranded to TOC, this classic venue is wonderful for anything that goes on there. From classical to jazz to indie music, TOC is the place to hear it. Weekly free Sack Lunch concerts every Wednesday are a great way to hear music …

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful architecture and great venue for shows. It was an all around great experience id enjoy repeating in the future. I attended a public event for ubderstanding lgbq and trans gender pronouns

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: The Old Church Concert Hall is a saved historic church that is now a venue for music, shows, lectures and theater.  Each Wednesday it provides a free noon time concert The Old Church Concert Hall is also a famous wedding venue in Portland Oregon

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Fantastic venue. great sound. nice to be able to sit at a general admission show in an intimate venue. beautiful space, too.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Wonderful acoustics and a dependably awesome music lineup. One of my favorite venues for folk and world music.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Excellent! The acoustics were terrific,  and the older gothic arches, stained glass, and the non-chapel area rooms are so architecturally designed, it was awe inspiring.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: A great venue for small intimate concerts.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: It's an old church! Great venue for intimate shows. I saw Doug Martsch solo here and, more recently, Mary Halvorson. Recommended for true music lovers.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Stunning interior! Saw a very moving concert here - was it the musician, the gorgeous space, the community? That combination of ingredients made the event just magical.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Great Christmas Concert with Michael Allen Harrison.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: What an acoustically FANTASTIC venue!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: It’s a really nice small venue. And they have a good lineup of shows... downside... people move a lot to get drinks over the shows.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: One of my favorite small concert venues.  Good acoustics and most seats have good visibility

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Very cool venue, would come back to a show I was only mildly interested in because the layout and acoustics are phenomenal

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Such a cool venue.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Great small venue, nice little full-service bar inside a beautiful historic landmark. Live music sounds fantastic in this room.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: A great place for theater and music !

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: I have been in Portland over 20 years and I missed this wonderful concert an excellent venue. I Now understand why people go back for the concert at Christmas every year. For the next 20 years I will probably be going to concerts

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Really lovely space and stage.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful old church that sounds amazing.  Comfortable, intimate location.  Will definitely be seeing other shows here.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Amazing concert venue! Absolutely gorgeous and the acoustics were spectacular

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: This is a fantastic show, recomend to anyone who enjoys a show with very talented musicians who can change up a show at the blink of an eye. Very relaxing and feel good show.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: This is a magical venue for a music performance. Have gone twice to see Michael Allen Harrison's Xmas Concert and we have never been disappointed.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Deliciously moody place for live music. Not a bar and so concessions are essentially snacks from a box but who cares when you have a location like this for listening.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Not so sure about the church but the parking lot next door is fantastic. Really firm ground for parking my car. Also a perk that Jesus protects your car from car jackers.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: One of my favorite spots to see local music, while supporting a non-profit to keep this magnificent building alive. Check out their schedule it's incredibly diverse!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Wonderful concert venue ... great atmosphere,  very good site lines and acoustics.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Loved it plus great concert. A beautiful church, nice neighborhood, I felt very comfortable there.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Super intimate setting for a concert very unique and memorable acoustics can't wait to come back!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: WA Governor Jay Inslee with a quick stop. Likely the most educated Presidential candidate regarding climate change, but preaching to the choir in the PNW. Question is how can he do garnering support in carbon generating Texas, the industrial midwest and the political boxing ring that is the northeast.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Beautiful space, but finding a place to sit is difficult as it is "pew" seating. People spread out and aren't always willing to make room for those left standing. Come early.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: TOC is a really good venue for performance, all kinds of acts are at TOC every day, with some noon concerts that are free. All shows are affordable.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Very beautiful church. A small church can survive in a big city. Makes me proud to see it still being used and maintained with pride.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: One of the most intimate venues in Portland. If you're considering a show here, do it. The polar opposite of an arena show, in the very best way.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Truly enjoy the free concert at noon every Wednesday!  Such a beautiful old church!

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Very nice and clean...good people and a very positive modeling show...the people who put together this show on done an excellent job.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Nice small venue. A bit slow getting in, but good sound and comfortable seats.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Wednesday lunch concerts are a treasure. It was the perfect place to get married.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Small, intimate space with perfect acoustics.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: As usual, a wonderful Michael Allen Harrison concert. He keeps it interesting by varying his Christmas program every year.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Historic, beautiful old church and a great place to hear a concert. Beautiful architecture.

Name: The Old Church
Review Text: Awesome venue! Sounded great, very intimate. Reasonably priced beers, perfect!

Review Text: Gorgeous space. I went here for a storytelling show called Russian Roulette that was a SUPER good time.
